includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt learns he must protect humanity from mythological creatures as part of an ancient order of hunters known as "Grimms".
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt learns he must protect mankind from mythological creatures as part of an ancient order of hunters known as "Grimms".
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt learns he must protect humanity from mythological creatures as part of an ancient order of hunters known as "Grimms".

includedAssets.title: Bears Will Be Bears
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - Bears Will Be Bears
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick investigates a case of breaking and entering at the home of a mysterious family after one of the intruders disappears.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nick investigates a case of breaking and entering at the home of a mysterious family after one of the intruders disappears.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick investigates a case of breaking and entering at the home of a mysterious family after one of the intruders disappears.

includedAssets.title: Beeware
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick investigates a gruesome murder that requires him to protect an enemy from his recent past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nick investigates a gruesome murder that requires him to protect an enemy from his recent past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick investigates a gruesome murder that requires him to protect an enemy from his recent past.

includedAssets.title: Lonelyhearts
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick sends Monroe undercover after several women fall prey to a murderous creature using hypnotic seduction pheromones.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick sends Monroe undercover after several women fall prey to a murderous creature using hypnotic seduction pheromones.

includedAssets.title: Danse Macabre
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick and Hank investigate the gruesome death of a high school teacher, meeting a troubled outcast with a big secret.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick and Hank investigate the gruesome death of a high school teacher, meeting a troubled outcast with a big secret.

includedAssets.title: The Three Bad Wolves
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - The Three Bad Wolves

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick investigates an arson attack and the attempted murder of a Blutbad with links to Monroe.

includedAssets.title: Let Your Hair Down
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Let Your Hair Down
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick reopens a long-closed missing persons case after investigating a homicide that points to a feral murderer living in the woods.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick reopens a long-closed missing persons case after investigating a homicide that points to a feral murderer living in the woods.

includedAssets.title: Game Ogre
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick and Hank are in danger when an escaped convict of incredible strength and size begins to hunt down those who put him away.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick and Hank are in danger when an escaped convict of incredible strength and size begins to hunt down those who put him away.

includedAssets.title: Of Mouse And Man
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep9 - Of Mouse And Man

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick and Hank investigate when a body is found in a garbage truck, leading them to the victim's suspicious neighbours.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The death of a homeless teen leads Nick to a creature that harvests the organs of humans.

includedAssets.title: Tarantella
includedAssets.synopsis: Nick hunts a murderer who seduces men before killing them with a corrosive poison, bringing him into conflict with a deadly Spinnetod.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nick hunts a murderer who seduces men before killing them with a corrosive poison, bringing him into conflict with a deadly Spinnetod.

includedAssets.title: Last Grimm Standing
includedAssets.synopsis: A murder case leads Nick to an underground fighting scheme led by a pride of bloodthirsty Löwen, a feral lionesque species.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt (David Giuntoli) discovers he is the latest in a long line of protectors known as “Grimms”, tasked with guarding humanity from dangerous mythological creatures. Thrilling fantasy drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Detective Nick Burkhardt (David Giuntoli) learns he is a “Grimm”: a guardian sworn to protect mankind from monsters. Thrilling fantasy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt (David Giuntoli) discovers he is the latest in a long line of protectors known as “Grimms”, tasked with guarding humanity from dangerous mythological creatures. Thrilling fantasy drama.
